meanings.sent1: Mozart was a talented symphonists, creating beautiful music for orchestras.
meanings.sent2: Beethoven is considered one of the greatest symphonists in history.
meanings.sent3: The symphonists gathered in the concert hall, each eager to share their latest compositions.
meanings.sent4: The symphonists' notes danced together in harmony, painting a vivid musical landscape.
meanings.sent5: The young symphonists practiced diligently, striving to perfect their craft.

meanings.definition: A group of composers who specialize in writing symphonies.
meanings.sent1: The symphonists collaborated on a new piece that would showcase their collective talent.
meanings.sent2: The symphonists' works were celebrated at the prestigious music festival.
meanings.sent3: At the symphonists' meeting, they debated the best way to conclude their latest symphony.
meanings.sent4: The symphonists' unity created a powerful musical force that resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The symphonists' dedication to their art inspired a new generation of musicians.
